message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

Looking at the cash flow statement, this is typically represented by "Depreciation" in the Operating Activities section.

In the given problem, I can see the following line item:
- Depreciation: 91503.27

Depreciation is indeed the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, so this is the value I'm looking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91503.27'}}
```
